summary: This is an email communication from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) regarding an accepted call with Andy Tomback and Marc Weinstein, who are associated with the Epstein estate. The document indicates ongoing legal or administrative contact between federal prosecutors and representatives of Epstein's estate.

persons.name: Andy Tomback
persons.context: Mentioned as a participant in an accepted call with the U.S. Attorney's Office, representing the Epstein estate.

persons.name: Marc Weinstein
persons.context: Mentioned as a participant in an accepted call with the U.S. Attorney's Office, representing the Epstein estate.

connections.description: Both are listed as representatives of the Epstein estate in communication with the U.S. Attorney's Office.

events.title: Accepted call with Epstein estate representatives
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York accepted a call with Andy Tomback and Marc Weinstein, who represent the Epstein estate.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was in communication with representatives of Jeffrey Epstein's estate in March 2021.
Andy Tomback and Marc Weinstein are identified as representatives of the Epstein estate.
The communication was an accepted call, indicating ongoing legal or administrative proceedings related to the Epstein case after his death.
